channel.title: Cheatsheet on Ctrl+Alt+Dark
channel.description: Recent content in Cheatsheet on Ctrl+Alt+Dark

item.title: MSSQL Cheat Sheet
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: Microsoft SQL Server forensics and threat hunting guide covering registry paths, log locations, attack indicators, and configuration analysis for compromised SQL Server instances.

item.title: Sigma Rule Cheat Sheet
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: Concise guide for writing Sigma detection rules covering structure, modifiers, best practices, and tools for SOC analysts and detection engineers working with Splunk, Elastic, or LogPoint.

item.title: MacOS CLI Commands Cheat Sheet
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: Essential macOS Terminal commands for file operations, process management, networking, Homebrew, and security controls like Gatekeeper and SIP for sysadmins and DFIR practitioners.

item.title: Markdown Cheatsheet
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: Quick reference for Markdown syntax covering headings, formatting, lists, links, code blocks, and tables for documentation and technical writing.

item.title: Windows CLI Commands Cheat Sheet
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: Fast-access PowerShell reference for system administration, automation, security auditing, covering file management, networking, scripting, and Winget for IT pros and analysts.

item.title: Windows Registry Cheat Sheet
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: Key Windows Registry locations for persistence mechanisms, user activity traces, and IOC hunting in malware analysis and forensic investigations for DFIR professionals.

item.title: Malware Analysis Cheat Sheet
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: Comprehensive reference for static and dynamic malware analysis using Ghidra, x64dbg, REMnux, including PDF analysis, unpacking techniques, and reverse engineering workflows. - static-analysis - dynamic-analysis

item.title: Windows Log Analysis Cheat Sheet (+ Chainsaw)
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: Critical Windows event IDs, logon types, and log locations for threat hunting and incident response, including Security.evtx, PowerShell logs, and Chainsaw analysis techniques.

item.title: Regex Cheat Sheet
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: Essential regex patterns for matching, capturing, and string manipulation adapted for security analysts, blue teamers, and SOC professionals working with detection rules.

item.title: IP & Domain Investigation Cheat Sheet
item.author: james.northey@proton.me (Darkrym)
item.description: Essential techniques for IP and domain investigations including reputation checks, WHOIS lookups, DNS inspection, passive intelligence, and payload retrieval for threat hunting and incident response.
